sen.j: 紀 長田麻呂（き の おさだまろ、天平勝宝7年（755年） - 天長2年（825年）6月 (旧暦)）は、平安時代初期の官人。
sen.e: KI no Osadamaro (born in 755 and died in June, 828) was a government official in the beginning of the Heian period.
KI no Osadamaro (755 - June 825) was a government official in the beginning of the Heian period.
sen.cmt: 原文のスタイルに合わせました。８２８年になっています。
sen.e: KI no Osadamaro (755 - June 825) was a government official in the beginning of the Heian period.

sen.j: 系図によれば、相模国介紀稲手の子。
sen.e: According to the lineage, he was a son of KI no Inate, Sagami no kuni no suke (Assistant Governor of Sagami Province).
sen.cmt: 紀稲手の読み方は用語集を参考にしました。
sen.e: According to his family tree, he was the son of KI no Inate, the Sagami no kuni no suke (Assistant Governor of Sagami Province).
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため修正しました。
sen.e: According to his family tree, he was the son of KI no Inate, the Sagami no kuni no suke (Assistant Governor of Sagami Province).

sen.j: 大同 (日本)3年（808年）従五位下筑前国守に任ぜられる。
sen.e: In 808, he was assigned as Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Chikuzen no kami (Governor of the Chikuzen Province).
In 808, he was appointed to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Chikuzen no kami (Governor of the Chikuzen Province).
sen.cmt: appointed toの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: In 808, he was appointed to Jugoinoge (Junior Fifth Rank, Lower Grade) Chikuzen no kami (Governor of the Chikuzen Province).

sen.j: 以後、大宰府・宮内省などを歴任。
sen.e: After that, he worked in various government sections such as Dazaifu (the local government office in Kyushu region) and Kunaisho (the Imperial Household Agency).
After that, he worked at various government offices such as the Dazaifu (the local government office in Kyushu region) and the Kunaisho (the Imperial Household Agency).
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため修正しました。
sen.e: After that, he worked at various government offices such as the Dazaifu (the local government office in Kyushu region) and the Kunaisho (the Imperial Household Agency).

sen.j: 弘仁6年（815年）従五位上に昇叙される。
sen.e: In 815, he got promoted to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade).
In 815, he was promoted to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade).
sen.cmt: wasの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: In 815, he was promoted to Jugoinojo (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade).
In June, 825, he died at the age of 71.
He died at the age of 71 in June 825.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため修正しました。
sen.e: He died at the age of 71 in June 825.

sen.j: 最終官位は散位従四位上勲位だった。
sen.e: His final rank was Sani Jushiinojo Kuni (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade courtier without post order).
His last rank was Sani Jushiinojo Kuni (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade courtier without post order).
sen.cmt: last rankの方が良いと思います。
sen.e: His last rank was Sani Jushiinojo Kuni (Junior Fifth Rank, Upper Grade courtier without post order).
